subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pedro Martínez held the Brevard County Manatees, a Brewers affiliate, to two runs, both unearned, and two hits in five innings in a 4-3 victory for Class A Port St. Lucie.
snippet: Pedro Martínez held the Brevard County Manatees, a Brewers affiliate, to two runs, both unearned, and two hits in five innings in a 4-3 victory for Class A Port St. Lucie.
